text:
HSSF does not allow the client to specify that a row is to be "frozen".  A 
Frozen row is displayed at the top of every page when the document is paginated 
(i.e. when printing the workbook).  This is commonly used ot create column 
headers that are displayed on every page.
creator: cjohannsen@leapnet.com
poi-support@buni.org
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 8739 ***
